item.title: How can i make an item like a bandos godsword members only?
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

i gotcha
okay look in the players tab thing open up a file and make sure they have
something that looks like so charcter-ismember = 0 something like that yes?
so then find the bgs file (if its a custom it will be in class8) other wise probbaly client.java
then it should be similar to this if skill 1 = 80 and shit just add && isMember = 1
need help PM ur teamviewer 5 ID and PASS and ill help u out
